item.title: HTML Slide Show Survey
item.description: PowerPoint and other proprietary slide-ware, bah! We already have a universal, open system for communication called the web, so let’s explore web presentation applications.

item.title: Building the LAMP stack with Phing
item.description: A flashback to 2007 with a tangible artifact in my journey to infrastructure as code: building the LAMP stack with Phing.
